chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass, my name is Kenneth Chee歡迎收聽口說英語通我是齊彬老師In this unit, we are going to talk about animated movies or animation這個單元裡我們要來討論的是動畫電影好了,那麼我們趕快就來聽一下這個單元的問題以及示範回答

chunks.chunk_text: QuestionDescribe an animated movie you recently enjoyed and explain why you like this animated movie so much
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: This movie was about a panda named Po on his way to discover his destiny to be a dragon warriorBut he experienced many problems and challengesAnd Po had to get strong not just physically but also mentally to fight against the evil guysHe took on lots of responsibilities and also the assistance of his martial art companionsAnyway, I enjoyed the story
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: Besides, the production of the movie was wonderfulAll the shots were perfectI know that a good number of people had worked hard to make it a successSo, it received positive criticisms all around
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: 最後當然還要說Why you like to watch it那麼我們就來回答Watching movies is one of my hobbies看電影是我的嗜好之一To be more specific, I enjoy the animations明確的來說,我喜歡動畫電影To be specific這個片語就是明確的來說Animation是一個名詞指的是動畫或動畫片

chunks.chunk_text: Remember後面加上v-i-n-g這樣的用法表示記得去做過某件事
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: I watched the movie again on TV a couple of days ago兩天前我還在電視上又看了一次下面當然要來說一下這部電影The movie was about a panda named Po on his way to discover his destiny to be a dragon warrior這部電影是關於一個名叫Poe的熊貓然後要發現自己的命運要成為神龍戰士
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這個Named用的是過去分詞表示被命名為那麼它經常放在名詞的後面就是名為什麼Discover his destiny發現自己的命運Destiny是一個名詞表示著定的命運Dragon是名詞叫做龍的意思Warrior就是戰士
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: 不過它也經歷到非常多的問題與挑戰Experience這個字在這邊當作動詞不過它也可以當名詞都是經驗體驗的意思But Poe要強大起來不只身體上而且心裡也要纔能夠對抗壞人
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: 要強大要強壯後面Not just physically but also mentally這邊用了Not just but also不僅而且這樣的對等連接詞句型Physically表示身體上的還有Mentally心靈上的Fight against the evil guys要對抗壞人
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: And also the assistance of his martial arts companions他不僅要承擔很多的責任而且有他的功夫好夥伴的幫忙Take on responsibilities指的就是承擔責任的意思後面Assistance是名詞叫做協助至於Marshal art是名詞叫做武術Companion也是名詞叫做同伴
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: Anyway I enjoy the story好啦我就是很喜歡這部電影Anyway是一個副詞就是無論如何這個英美人是非常常用這個字的Besides the production of the movie was wonderful此外這部電影的製作非常的棒Production是一個名詞電影上指的就是製作All the shots were perfect
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe an animated movie you recently enjoyed. 描述一部你最近看的動畫電影.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所有的拍攝都非常的完美Shot在這邊是一個名詞指的就是拍攝I know that a good number of people had worked hard to make it a success我知道有很多人的努力才把它變成一部成功的電影這邊A good number of指的就是許多的意思Success是一個名詞在這裡把它當成可數的指的是成功的事物

chunks.chunk_text: So it received positive criticisms all around所以它收到的都是正面的評價Receive是一個動詞就是接受到Positive是形容詞正面的肯定的Criticism也是一個名詞叫做批評評論最後All around是一個片語表示全面性的

chunks.chunk_text: Companion名詞同伴夥伴Criticism名詞批評批判這個單元我們講的是Animated Movie或是Animation動畫片希望您都學會了最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通我是奇兵老師
